subject: Hockey, Ice
Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman and other supporters of the real estate project tell the Hempstead Town Board that renovation of Nassau Coliseum is necessary to keep the Islanders from moving.
snippet: N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman and other supporters of the real estate project tell the Hempstead Town Board that renovation of Nassau Coliseum is necessary to keep the Islanders from moving.
